attributes.action: want the council tax to be scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to scrap council tax as we already pay enough tax and national insurance contributions, it is taking over £100 per month from hard working people and they are stuggling to pay other bills or cannot have the luxuries they are entitled to because they have worked for it.

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on council tax:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=council+tax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
